column2: title=Lembas Extra 2011: Proceedings of the 6th Tolkien Genootschap Unquendor's Lustrum, Baarlo, May 20-22, 2011

column1: '''''Lembas Extra 2011: Proceedings of the 6th Tolkien Genootschap Unquendor's Lustrum, Baarlo, May 20-22, 2011''''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Lembas (journal)
column2: Lembas Extra]]''. The issue contains twelve articles and poems (all in English).

column1: *[[Tom Shippey]]: "The ancestors of the Hobbits, strange creatures in English folklore"
*Christian Weichmann: "The right way to speak to dragons"
